dt: {bc}a line for leading or restraining an animal
{bc}something that restrains {bc}the state of being restrained
{bc}a set of three animals (such as greyhounds, foxes, bucks, or hares)

et: Middle English {it}lees, leshe{/it}, from Anglo-French {it}*lesche, lesse{/it}, probably from {it}lesser{/it} to leave, let go
shortdef: a line for leading or restraining an animal
something that restrains : the state of being restrained
a set of three animals (such as greyhounds, foxes, bucks, or hares)
